channel.title: mclai on Laboratory of Autism and Neurodevelopmental Disorders (LAND)
channel.description: Recent content in mclai on Laboratory of Autism and Neurodevelopmental Disorders (LAND)

item.description: Dr. Meng-Chuan Lai is Clinician Scientist and Oâ€™Brien Scholar in the Child and Youth Mental Health Collaborative at CAMH, The Hospital for Sick Children and the University of Toronto. He is Assistant Professor in the Department of Psychiatry in the Faculty of Medicine at the University of Toronto. He is also honorary Director of Gender Research in Autism at the Autism Research Centre of the University of Cambridge (UK), and Adjunct Attending Psychiatrist and Assistant Professor of Psychiatry and Psychology at the National Taiwan University.
